definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: He bought a bound volume of the magazine .
sentences.chinese: 他买了一本该杂志的合订本。

sentences.english: No more TPBs of the club comics.
sentences.chinese: 没有出版俱乐部专属漫画合订本的计划。

sentences.english: Excuse me, where can I buy the bound volume of the magazine?
sentences.chinese: 打扰一下，请问哪里可以买到这本杂志的合订本？

sentences.english: Starched reinforced fabric used to strengthen a book binding or the spine of a bound book .
sentences.chinese: 用于加固书本封皮或合订本书脊的浆硬加厚织布。

definition: a series of books/a collection of books
printing plate/printed version (of a digital publication)/printing (as in "1st printing" etc)
